ygData.subject: Re: HyperNEAT 3.0 C++ missing files

Hey there,

You are absolutely right, the manual forgot to include the Boar=
d library as a dependency and where to get it:

http://libboard.sourceforge=
.net/  libBoard is used by the python visualizer to create document-ready i=
mages of substrates as displayed in http://eplex.cs.ucf.edu/publications/20=
10/gauci.nc10.html .

I created a cmake build system for libboard that the =
developers have adopted into their source tree, so the procedure of buildin=
g libboard is similar to building tinyxmlplus.

I will update the manual an=
d release a new version of the code with the updated manual and a copy of l=
ibboard included in the next few days.


--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Jean-=
